abstract: New world, new opportunities, new community.
description: Migrating to Australia from Ankara, Turkey in 1978, Yusuf Hazar fondly looks back on the life he and his wife created for his six children. Feeling a deep sense of gratitude to his adopted country, Yusuf and his family are committed to helping out others in the community.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002010; Stories from the Turkish community : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2007
